when trying to see my drivers, it says "no proprietary drivers are in use on this system"
press Alt+F2 and type "gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf" without the quote and press ENTER
this should open your configuration file for X, look for "Section "Device"" in it
you should see something like "Driver "intel"" in the Section labeled "Devices"
